metrics.name: Res. Covid Deaths
metrics.source_desc: Number of residents with suspected or laboratory positive COVID-19 who died in the facility or another location. The number to the right in parentheses is the increase from the prior weeks total deaths.

metrics.source_desc: Number of residents with suspected or laboratory positive COVID-19 who died in the facility or another location. The number to the right in parentheses is the increase from the prior weeks total deaths.
